reviews.text: Yesterday me and my girlfriend we had a 90 mins in the Spa !! We booked our session before and when we reached they let us wait like 10 mins to enter and then inside the customer service was bad the lady always giving instructions and like she was in a bad mood yesterday and she wants to share her bad vibes with people.. I usually went there and I got a better customer service.. so sad to put 1 star but this is actually what she deserve.

The hotel itself is situated in a good location, but this does not make up for the quality of service. My room had loose tiles in the bathroom with bits of the floor being uneven and causing a trip hazard. Furthermore, we were in desperate need for ice as one of my companions got heat stroke and they made us pay for it! Hotel guests were rude (zenophobic) and staff did not bother to intervene. They really should consider hiring a security guard as it seems normal members of staff are not capable of dealing with difficult customers. Food was lukewarm, churros barely defrosted and there was no signage showing what the food even was which is a massive hazard when travelling with people that have food intolerances. Even when asking the kitchen staff they weren't 100% sure what they were serving. The only thing that was nice about this place was the view onto a pretty looking ALDI.
I only went to the Spa. The facilities are quite small, there are 3 small pools with different jets and bubbles. It was a bit full and noisy. 1 hour was enough. Price is ok with vouchers from Groupon

This old hotel may have been a 4 once, but it's clearly been lacking in maintenance and living off of old photos and paid access spa photos that are not facilities available without huge surcharges. The hotel pool is lanes and swimming caps are required. The beds are very firm, and the pillows so thin they are useless. The walls are paper thin and have no discernible sound absorption qualities.
Many floors are textured and hard cases make a light thunder like noise when passing your room.

Wifi is patchy as hell - we got

Wow the spa experience was so nice , massage was fantastic , spa was small but clean , not relaxing everyone chatting quite loud , but was pleasant anyways :) will be back to stay at the hotel next time :)
